title: C08L Asset Tracker
metaTitle: C08L Long Standby GPS Tracker | FleetGoo
metaDesc: C08L 4G Asset Tracker with ultra-long battery life, ideal for trailer and container tracking.
fullDescription: The C08L is an advanced asset tracker featuring an ultra-long standby battery, making it perfect for tracking non-powered assets like containers, trailers, and construction equipment. Its wireless magnetic installation allows for rapid deployment without complex wiring.
features: Strong magnetic mount for instant installation
IP67 Waterproof for harsh outdoor use
Multiple working modes to save power
packaging: 1x C08L Tracker, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x User Guide
